duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete all fittings and alterations to the high standards of the company.
Maintain service levels by providing excellent customer experience through problem-solving and meeting emotional and practical needs.
Proactively address customer concerns and communicate the importance of alterations in perfecting the garment for the customer's event.
Assist stylists in closing sales by consulting with customers regarding garment fit and customization.
Maintain inventory management by processing special orders pick-ups and ensuring first-quality standards for all merchandise.
Manage all alterations, fittings, sewing, steaming, pressing, and spot cleaning of garments to company standards.
Resolve customer service issues in a swift and effective manner that complies with company guidelines.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent degree
1-2 years prior retail experience in an apparel or specialty store environment.
Prior sewing experience required, preferably in bridal and/or special occasion production environment.
Prior experience with computerized POS (Point of Sale) system is a plus.
